platform.summary: A Docker image containing a fully-operational Galaxy instance with pre-installed QuanTP tools.
comments: A suite of tools and functionalities critical for proteo-transcriptomics, including statistical algorithms for assessing the correlation between single transcriptâ€“protein pairs as well as across two cohorts, outlier identification and clustering, along with a diverse set of results visualizations.
QuanTP is available in this Docker image, and on the [Proteogenomics Gateway](/src/use/proteogenomics-gateway/index.md) and [UseGalaxy.eu](https://usegalaxy.eu/).
user_support: [Supporting information](http://z.umn.edu/quantpsi), including *Instructions for accessing the QuanTP tool on Jetstream*, *Instructions for accessing and running the Mouse data*, and *Accessing the QuanTP on the usegalaxy.eu*
citations: [QuanTP: A software resource for quantitative proteo-transcriptomic comparative data analysis and informatics](https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acs.jproteome.8b00727), Kumar P, Panigrahi P, Johnson J, Weber WJ, Mehta S, Sajulga R, Easterly C, Crooker BA, [Heydarian M](/src/people/mo-heydarian/index.md), Anamika K, Griffin TJ, Jagtap P., *Journal of  Proteome Research*, 2018 Dec 24. doi: 10.1021/acs.jproteome.8b00727
sponsors: University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota, United States
